summary: In an extremely poor region in the Northeast of Brazil, a group of soldiers try to stop the population from sacking a food deposit.
cast: Átila Iório|Nelson Xavier|Maria Gladys|Leonidas Bayer|Ivan Cândido|Paulo César Peréio|Hugo Carvana|Mauricio Loyola|Ruy Polanah|Joel Barcellos|Antonio Pitanga|Maria Adélia|Paulo Campos|Billy Davis|Hugo Kusnetzoff|Maria Ligia|Cecil Thiré
title: Los fusiles
